bwem

Class BWEM

  • java.lang.Object
    • bwem.BWEM

  • public final class BWEM
extends Object
    BWEM Broodwar Map analysis library by Igor Dimitrijevic. Ported to Java by the OpenBW Team By default BWEM throws when an invalid state is encountered. But if you know what you are doing, you can skip these throws by setting setFailOnError(boolean) to `false`. These errors will then be outputted to `System.err`, but this can also be changed with setFailOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream) (if you set it to `null` the errors will be completely ignored).
